chapter.title: Known Issues
chapter.para:
To view information about known issues in this release of JBoss Developer Studio, see on the JBoss issue tracking system and enter the following search query as one line: (project in (JBIDE) AND (affectedVersion in ("4.0.0.Final", "4.0.1.Final") OR fixVersion in ("4.1.x", "4.2.x")) OR project = JBDS AND (affectedVersion in ("6.0.0.GA", "6.0.1.GA") OR fixVersion in ("7.0.x"))) AND type in (Bug) AND resolution in (Unresolved)
The query results correspond to reported issues but the issues may not yet have been confirmed by the product team.
